data.name: RubyConf AU 2020
data.description: Our Opportunity Program includes a free ticket to the conference plus an allowance for travel and accommodation costs for those outside Melbourne. This is for people who would otherwise not be able to afford attending RubyConf AU - we know not everyone receives the same opportunities to get ahead in…

data.name: Security, Identity, and Privacy Miniconf
data.description: Never has security been more in the news. Companies around the world know that they are going to have to prioritise identity and privacy within systems designs and processes, to ensure customers and clients are protected more than ever. While laws like the GDPR give us guidelines and recommendations…
